meanings.sent1: The disempowered team struggled to make their voices heard.
meanings.sent2: She felt disempowered when her ideas were constantly ignored.
meanings.sent3: The disempowered squirrel tried to lead the other animals in a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: The disempowered ship was adrift in a sea of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The disempowered flower wilted under the scorching sun.

meanings.definition: Made to feel less confident or capable.
meanings.sent1: The disempowered student hesitated to speak up in class.
meanings.sent2: He became disempowered after receiving harsh criticism.
meanings.sent3: The disempowered cat tried to meow like a lion.
meanings.sent4: Her disempowered spirit was like a flickering candle in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The disempowered athlete stumbled during the race.

meanings.definition: Lacking the ability to make decisions or take action.
meanings.sent1: The disempowered robot malfunctioned and stood still.
meanings.sent2: Feeling disempowered, she waited for someone else to decide.
meanings.sent3: The disempowered toaster refused to pop up the toast.
meanings.sent4: His disempowered mind was a locked door with no key.
meanings.sent5: The disempowered car sputtered and stalled on the road.
